Variations on a Ninth
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK 'Toccata' from 'Organ Symphony No 5' - Widor arr. Sparke: 1 Camborne, 90 2 Bodmin, 88 3 Mount Charles, 85 4 St Austell, 83
Best Player: Aaron Harvey, cornet, Bodmin
Best Soprano: Andrew Jay, Bodmin Best Solo Cornet: Aaron Harvey, Bodmin Best Euphonium: John Hitchens, Camborne Best Solo Horn: Mark Letcher, Bodmin Best Set of Basses: Camborne
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Leanne Harris, Simon Dobson
Deportment (judge Gareth Roberts): 1 Bugle (Class C) 2 Torrington (Class D)
July 16, 2010, 11:11 p.m. Aug. 6, 2013, 2:43 p.m.
